Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Manchester in 1955...
Injured on 7/20/1957 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/3/1960 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Drafted in 3rd round, 62nd overall pick, by Pontiac in 1967...
Injured on 8/31/1970 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Released by Pontiac on 9/15/1975...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 3/1/1976 to a minor league contract.
Had first career hit on 6/8/1977, off Clair Clutter (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/1978, off Gregory Johnson (DIA)...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 3/1/1983 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 6/14/1984 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
